mapper.insert: insert into study_groups (id, name, type, goal, creator_id, created_at, member_count) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{goal}, #{creatorId}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update study_groups set member_count = member_count + 1 where id = #{id}
update study_groups set member_count = member_count - 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from study_groups where name like #{word} or goal like #{word}
